name: Space Cats (Weiiswurst)
description:
Your Mothership broke down.

You are in an asteroid field and have to gather resources.

I would recommend reading the info at the "INFO" main menu button because it explains the game and its controls.

Important: The HTML5-WebGL-Version can only be played in certain browsers! NOT SUPPORTED ARE: IE, Edge, Browsers without JavaScript. I can guarantee support for Firefox.
